GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v5.10.130
GSD.description:
usbnet: fix memory leak in error case

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.130 by commit 0085da9df3dced730027923a6b48f58e9016af91, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit 877bd862f32b815d54ab5fc10a4fd903d7bf3012. For more details please see the references link.
